If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer From the first collection to the most recent, women find Candela to be sophisticated, romantic, and subtly sexy, a result of Latino influences. Though the looks have evolved, the natural beauty and carefree attitude of Candela has remained constant. Featured in glossies like Lucky and InStyle, and worn by celebrities like Kate Hudson, Lindsay Lohan, and Lauren Conrad, Candela is one line to watch for its continual refinement of innovative styles and fine fabrics.
